embed.description: Will be releasing a full detailed azir guide.

replies.body: Ummm...it's just summoning a soldier over a wall, Eing, and then Q & E combo to go along for the ride over the second one, right? Or perhaps you might not even need the second E if your Q is fast enough and you haven't hit your soldier yet.
It's more about the fact that he can jump two walls. Unprepared enemies might burn summoners or mobility ults trying to catch him, when he's nowhere near where they expect.
Far enough. He does have awesome mobility if his cooldowns are managed properly and his positioning is kept in check.
oh no now people are actually going to play azir!
He's already gotten nerfed (soldier dmg reduced, while q poke increased) so let's hope not!
I could only manage to do the dragon pit one, I think my ping needs to be lower before it works right.
nice hacks, did you make them yourself?
^This guy.
i do know what it means, ive seen videos of it on youtube
What?  Everytime I do the combo the game teleports me back to my last place...

Whats happening is, he sets the W down, he E's to the soldier casting Q as he's going through the air. The Q is programmed so that it goes through walls easily (similar to wards) So the Q quickly goes to the other side of the farthest wall and because they changed his E functionality it will carry him with it. You need to get the timing down to be able to do this, theres only a small window of time you can cast Q during your flight and have it so that you dont actually catch up to the soldier before the Q ends.
Lol, love your name! xD

so you press W for a soldier. u press E to go to ur soldier . and while you are in flight. you press  Q to make yourself go further before you actually reach your soldier.

easy stuff.

> so you press W for a soldier. u press E to go to ur soldier . and while you are in flight. you press  Q to make yourself go further before you actually reach your soldier.
> 
> easy stuff.

But the Q range is dependent on where Azir is, so you have to wait until the very last moment on a few of those to make it work.
bravo

that is some awesome shit!

Gonna make for some wicked gank-paths!
That's actually pretty cool. I can't wait to see some of the jukes we'll see because of this (assuming it's intended).
Thanks for sharing, that's awesome, and I did not know you could do that.
Interesting stuff.
About time this is actually possible.Should have been available since the release.

> About time this is actually possible.Should have been available since the release.

It was.
